newsitem.title: USA: Valmont sees lower EPS growth rate.
newsitem.headline: Valmont sees lower EPS growth rate.

text.p: Valmont Industries Inc said Wednesday that it expects a lower growth rate for the second quarter and rest of 1997 than it saw in its first quarter.
The company reported first quarter earnings of $0.63 per share on sales of $165 million, compared to year-earlier figures of $0.50 per share on sales of nearly $149 million.

"Based on the market drives we track, the second quarter and the remainder of the year should produce solid earnings increases for the company, but probably at a lower growth rate than we saw in the first quarter," the company said in a release.
